email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope you're doing well. We have a spot enquiry for 12,500MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. Our initial freight quote is USD 42 per metric ton.

The vessel we propose is the OCEAN HORIZON, with a DWT of 82,000 and LOA of 225m. Please let us know your thoughts and if you have any specific requirements for the laycan or loading window.

Best regards,
Liam Harris
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the quote. The rate seems a bit high for our current budget. We are looking to secure a long-term agreement and can commit to multiple shipments over the next year.

Could you review the rate and possibly offer a discount considering our volume commitment? Also, could you provide the demurrage rate per day?

Thanks,
Emily Carter
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for your interest in a long-term agreement. Considering your volume commitment, we can offer a revised rate of USD 40 per metric ton. The demurrage rate will be USD 12,000 per day.

Please confirm if this meets your requirements and if you need any further details on the laycan or stem.

Best regards,
Liam Harris
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the revised quote. The rate of USD 40 per metric ton is more in line with our expectations. However, we need to ensure that the demurrage rate is reasonable. Could you confirm the laytime start and end dates?

Best,
Emily Carter
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

The laytime will start on 2023-10-01 and end on 2023-10-10. We can offer a laytime of 7 days with the demurrage rate of USD 12,000 per day thereafter.

Please confirm if these terms are acceptable.

Best regards,
Liam Harris
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

We are satisfied with the terms and the laytime period. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Thanks,
Emily Carter
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Liam Harris
Ocean Freight Brokers
